article_title: The 5 most feel-good sports stories of 2014

article_metadata.description: Somewhere along the line, it seems as if being a sports fan stopped being fun. Doubt that? Listen in to sports talk radio, read the local sports pages. Whining, moaning,  foaming, raging dominate.

og.description: It wasn't all court rooms and concussions. A look at the stories from the past year that didn't make us feel cynical about sports.
og.title: The 5 most feel-good sports stories of 2014
